original_text: You know that we lived in a good way when we were with you. God also knows that. We were completely honest with you believers. Nobody could say that we did anything wrong.
korean_text: 우리가 너희 믿는 자들을 향하여 어떻게 거룩하고 옳고 흠 없이 행하였는지에 대하여 너희가 증인이요 하나님도 그러하시도다

sentences.original_text: You know that we lived in a good way
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 바르게 살았다는 것을 너희는 안다

sentences.original_text: We were completely honest with you believers
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 너희 믿는 자들에게 완전히 정직했다

sentences.original_text: Nobody could say that we did anything wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 우리가 잘못한 일을 했다고 말할 수 없었다
